1.name: Product ingredients not marked on package
1.desc: The ingredients of the product are not marked on the packaging of the product.

2.name: Product price not marked on packaging
2.desc: The product price is not marked on the packaging of the product.

3.name: Product best before date not marked on product package
3.desc: The product best before date is not marked on the packaging of the product.

4.name: Package not marked recyclable
4.desc: Package is not marked as recyclable.

5.name: Promotional details marked
5.desc: A code indicating that promotional details have been marked on the package.

6.name: Labeled according to general EAN.UCC specifications for clothing and fashion accessories
6.desc: The item is labeled according to the general EAN.UCC specifications for clothing and fashion accessories.

31.name: Package best before date marked
31.desc: Package is marked with the product best before date.

34.name: Product marking
34.desc: The information is related to product marking.

35.name: Type of package
35.desc: The information is related to the type of package.

37.name: Package protection
37.desc: The information is related to protection of the package.

38.name: Tarping
38.desc: The information describes how coverage with tarpaulins is to be provided.

39.name: Platform/skid location
39.desc: The information describes the platform or skid location.

40.name: Bearing piece location
40.desc: The information gives the location of the load bearing piece.

41.name: Skid/pallet type
41.desc: The information describes the type of skid or pallet.

42.name: Placement on carrier
42.desc: The information describes the placement on the carrier.

44.name: Unloading device
44.desc: The information specifies the unloading device which must be used to handle the package.

45.name: Unloading equipment
45.desc: The information specifies the unloading equipment which must be used to handle the package.

50.name: Package barcoded EAN-13 or EAN-8
50.desc: The package is barcoded with EAN-13 or EAN-8 code.

51.name: Package barcoded ITF-14 or ITF-6
51.desc: The package is barcoded with ITF-14 or ITF-6 code.

52.name: Package barcoded UCC or EAN-128
52.desc: The package is barcoded with UCC or EAN-128 code.

53.name: Package price marked
53.desc: The package is marked with the price.

54.name: Product ingredients marked on package
54.desc: The ingredients of the product contained in a package are marked on that package.

55.name: Core characteristics
55.desc: Specifies the characteristics of the core of the package.

56.name: Shipping requirement
56.desc: The packaging as per shipping requirement.

57.name: Customs requirement
57.desc: The packaging as per Customs requirement.

58.name: Transport contract requirement
58.desc: The packaging as per transport contract requirement.

59.name: Preservation method
59.desc: The packaging related information is for methods of preservation.

60.name: Product marking pattern
60.desc: The information describes the pattern used to mark the product.

61.name: Product marking location
61.desc: The information provides the location of the product marking.

62.name: Package/container mark location
62.desc: The information provides the location of a package or container mark.

63.name: Marking method
63.desc: The information details the marking method.

66.name: Receiving facility limitations
66.desc: The information describes limitations which apply to a receiving facility.

67.name: Tagging/bar code instructions
67.desc: The information provides instructions as to how a package is to be tagged or have a bar code applied to it.

68.name: Shipping package labelling
68.desc: The labelling of a package in which goods are shipped.

69.name: Shipping package sealing
69.desc: The sealing particulars of a package in which goods are shipped.

70.name: Optional packaging procedure
70.desc: To indicate an optional procedure for packaging.

71.name: Cleaning or drying specification
71.desc: Identification of the cleaning or drying specification.

72.name: Cushioning thickness specification
72.desc: Identification of the cushioning thickness specification.

73.name: Cushioning and dunnage specification
73.desc: Identification of the cushioning and dunnage specification.

74.name: Level of preservation specification
74.desc: Identification of the level of preservation specification.

75.name: Preservation material specification
75.desc: Identification of the preservation material specification.

76.name: Unit container specification
76.desc: Identification of the unit container specification.

77.name: Material wrapping specification
77.desc: Identification of the material wrapping specification.
